languages.text: {n}Испещренный аугментами старик не отрывая рук от камня перед собой оборачивается на вас. На его лице читается выражение бескрайнего удивления.{/n} "Но зачем? К чему мне идти на сделку с мертвецом? Вы уже прошлое, а нас с губернатором ждет будущее!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Самовольно подчиняясь приказу, ваши ноги делают предательский шаг вперед. Вы ощущаете кожей обжигающее сияние глаз псайкера. Это он руководит вами, как марионеткой, затягивая жгут воли на вашей шее.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"
languages.original_text: {n}Испещренный аугментами старик не отрывая рук от камня перед собой оборачивается на вас. На его лице читается выражение бескрайнего удивления.{/n} "Но зачем? К чему мне идти на сделку с мертвецом? Вы уже прошлое, а нас с губернатором ждет будущее!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

{n}The heavily augmented old man hurriedly turns around to look at you. A look of utter amazement spreads across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I deal with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the Governor and I are the future!"

{n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

{n}The heavily augmented old man turns around hurriedly to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the Governor and I are the future!"

{n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

{n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

{n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

languages.text: {n}浑身上下都是植入物的老人转过了身，双手依然放在身前的水晶上。他看了你一眼，露出了惊奇不已的表情。{/n}“可我为什么要这么做呢？我为什么要和马上就要死了的人谈判呢？你的时代已经结束了，全新的未来正等着我和总督！”
languages.original_text: {n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

traits.locale_text: {n}浑身上下都是植入物的老人转过了身，双手依然放在身前的水晶上。他看了你一眼，露出了惊奇不已的表情。{/n}“可我为什么要这么做呢？我为什么要和马上就要死了的人谈判呢？你的时代已经结束了，全新的未来正等着我和总督！”

languages.text: {n}石から手を離さずに、身体の大部分がオーギュメント化された年老いた男性が振り返り、顔いっぱいに驚愕の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「だがなぜだ？なぜわしが、もうすぐ死ぬ者と交渉などせねばならん？お前は過去の存在、そして総督とわしは、未来へ向かう運命にあるのだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

traits.locale_text: {n}身体の大部分がオーギュメント化された年老いた男性が、慌てて振り返り、顔いっぱいに驚愕の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「だがなぜだ？なぜわしが、もうすぐ死ぬ者と交渉などせねばならん？お前は過去の存在、そして総督とわしは、未来へ向かう運命にあるのだ！」

languages.text: {n}Sin levantar las manos de la piedra que tiene delante, el anciano aumentado se gira y te mira con expresión de pasmo absoluto.{/n} «¿Pero por qué? ¿Por qué habría de negociar con un futuro cadáver? ¡Usted es el pasado, el gobernador y yo somos el futuro!».
languages.original_text: {n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin levantar las manos de la piedra que tiene delante, el anciano aumentado se gira y te mira con expresión de pasmo absoluto.{/n} «¿Pero por qué? ¿Por qué habría de negociar con un futuro cadáver? ¡Usted es el pasado, el gobernador y yo somos el futuro!».

languages.text: {n}Ellerini önündeki taştan çekmeyen ağır ogmentli ihtiyar, dönüp sana bakıyor. Suratına baktığında hayretler içinde olduğunu görüyorsun.{/n} "Neden? Birazdan cesede dönecekken neden seninle pazarlık edeyim? Sen geçmişte kaldın, valiyle bense geleceğe yürüyoruz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ellerini önündeki taştan çekmeyen ağır ogmentli ihtiyar, dönüp sana bakıyor. Suratına baktığında hayretler içinde olduğunu görüyorsun.{/n} "Neden? Birazdan cesede dönecekken neden seninle pazarlık edeyim? Sen geçmişte kaldın, valiyle bense geleceğe yürüyoruz!"

languages.text: {n}Sans retirer les mains de la pierre devant lui, le vieil homme lourdement augmenté se tourne vers vous en affichant un air stupéfait.{/n} « Pourquoi ? Pourquoi devrais-je négocier avec un futur cadavre ? Vous incarnez le passé, tandis que le gouverneur et moi allons écrire l'avenir ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans retirer les mains de la pierre devant lui, le vieil homme lourdement augmenté se tourne vers vous en affichant un air stupéfait.{/n} « Pourquoi ? Pourquoi devrais-je négocier avec un futur cadavre ? Vous incarnez le passé, tandis que le gouverneur et moi allons écrire l'avenir ! »

languages.text: {n}Ohne seine Hände von dem Stein vor sich zu nehmen, dreht der stark augmentierte alte Mann sich zu dir um und wirkt aufrichtig überrascht.{/n} "Aber warum? Warum sollte ich mit einer zukünftigen Leiche verhandeln? Ihr seid die Vergangenheit. Der Gouverneur und ich sind die Zukunft!"
languages.original_text: {n}Without removing his hands from the stone in front of him, the heavily augmented old man turns around to look at you, an expression of utter amazement spreading across his face.{/n} "But why? Why would I negotiate with a corpse-to-be? You are the past, and the governor and I are bound for the future!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne seine Hände von dem Stein vor sich zu nehmen, dreht der stark augmentierte alte Mann sich zu dir um und wirkt aufrichtig überrascht.{/n} "Aber warum? Warum sollte ich mit einer zukünftigen Leiche verhandeln? Ihr seid die Vergangenheit. Der Gouverneur und ich sind die Zukunft!"
